nodes.text: Graith starport was a military-grade spaceport located on the plateau above the o'beki of Graith on the Goroth Prime. Surrounded by high blast walls, it was connected to Graith by a roadway referred to as the "Grand Avenue."

The starport was divided into two sections. The larger part of the facility was given over to an Imperial military facility. Two full squadrons of TIE/LN starfighters were stationed at the base, along with several Tribune-class shuttles.
A smaller area was given over to commercial traffic. Security was provided by a dozen K7 "Black Dagger" Security Droids and customs officials.
